name: Car & Away
slogan: Carandaway will revolutionise car ownership through peer to peer car sharing proposition
description:
Car & Away is a revolutionary well funded start-up which, at its heart, enables private car owners to rent their cars out when they are not using them. Think Airbnb for cars. Our brand purpose is to become the smartest peer-to-peer car sharing community globally and reduce the cars we need on our planet by 20%. 

Uniquely, Car & Away began at UK airports offering car owners a new choice to park and earn by renting their cars out while away. Using these cars we disrupt traditional car rental businesses by giving renters the exact car they book - no counters, no queues and no hidden extras. 

Stage two of the business is where it gets really big - activating airport acquired owners to rent their cars from home. Enabled through keyless instant book technology Car & Away will be the first platform in Europe to have 100% of cars instantly bookable.

This is a rare opportunity to join an exciting business that will transform the way in which we own and use cars.

jobs.title: Customer Operations Manager, Stansted Airport
jobs.description:
Customers are at the forefront of what we do, as an innovative and disruptive business we aim to lead the way providing superior customer service with a slick and smooth operation at Stansted Airport. We are proud of our fantastic customer reviews on Trustpilot, which are mainly due to the great work of this fantastic team

You will be quick thinking with a think outside the box attitude that allows you to both process information and react quickly to new challenges as they arise, remaining calm, collected and adapting suitable process to document and handle similar challenges as the business grows.

You will work closely with the Chief Operations Officer to develop a customer service strategy that delivers WOW with a pro-active approach; ensuring customers recognise the innovative nature of our business against traditional industry models.

Role Description

You will lead the customer support team at Stansted Airport ensuring a smooth and slick operation with a mixture of face to face, digital and telephony interaction with our customers.
You will work with the operations team to implement and manage systems and procedures to ensure the Pilot of this unique business model is successful, providing documentation and reporting at every stage that will form future business strategy.
You will assist with training, development and ongoing support of 2 customer supports, working with the COO to implement performance management systems that allow employees to develop.
You will lead the way in terms of service, working with the customer support team training them to support our customers creating advocates who will promote the brand and its growth.
You will be responsible for ensuring every customer receives outstanding service from booking/registration through to car drop off/collection, and ensuring a process in place to drive service related KPI’s.
You will take full ownership of the administrative function of the Stansted Operations team, ensuring both e-records and hard copy documentation is stored, managed and updated accordingly.
You and the team will act as the main customer communication channel between our brand and the customer. You will take every opportunity to interact with customers providing feedback to help improve the customer journey.
You will manage the team, and assist with brand awareness of the Car & Away brand, creating opportunities to position the brand and future use to all customers at Stansted Airport.
You will be the main point of contact for all customer complaints creating a reporting process complete with documentation with the support of the customer support team and COO.
You have customer insight in your DNA, with natural rapport building skills recognising varying situations to alter your approach and interact with customers from all backgrounds.
Personal Qualities & Skills

You will be a people person with a proven track record of providing excellent customer service across multiple channels and interfaces, including Face-to-Face, phone, email and instant messaging / chat apps.
You will be impeccably organised, with a passion for improving process and procedure keeping a well maintained and functioning office, team and overall customer operational process.
You will have experience managing a small team, with the ability to plan and coordinate staff rota’s, personal development procedures and create a welcoming and rewarding environment.
You will be innovative with resilient personality to push boundaries, with a calm and collected nature to deal with complex operational issues as they arise including crises management.
You will have at least 3 years’ experience in service-orientated operations and get a buzz from providing industry leading service.
You will have the ability to implement, manage and report on all administrative procedures and functions, taking charge on key performance improvements where necessary.
You will have experience using, and reporting on customer management systems, with knowledge of data protection regulations and customer confidentiality.
You may already be in a team leader and/or supervisory position with extensive experience operating administrative and customer service propositions, looking to further your career.
You are a strong believer in peer to peer propositions and how they can redefine service beyond any current corporate business model.
You’re a problem solver with the ability to think on your own two feet and create solutions to problems quickly, recognising support as and when required.
You have a positive “can do” attitude turning negatives into positives, with the ability to motivate others in times of difficulty.
You have experience dealing with business partners both internally and externally, creating professional long lasting relations.
Important hygiene factor – You are a conscientious driver with a clean driving licence.
Living close to Stansted is a positive, and flexibility to work weekends is essential as well.
Knowledge of car hire, fleet management, car sales or working with vehicle fleets is an advantage
Our Values

Open Minded & Creative
Challenging
Caring and Respectful (customer, community and each other)
Simplicity
Inspiring
Honesty and Transparency
